item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: Hello! My name is Andre. This is my first Blog Post. I plan to use this platform to document my progress in my personal projects and share what I learn. console.log("Hello From the Blog!") $y=mx+b$ x y 1 2 Hi Mama text me if you find this.

item.title: Raspberry Pi NextCloud Server
item.description: Cloud Storage, store and access all of your files, photos, and videos from anywhere. It’s amazing … until you hit the dreaded storage limit. Recently, I ran into this exact problem. Apparently years of wrestling match videos takes a lot of space from google drive. After searching for a solution, I came across self-hosting. Yes, I could just buy more cloud storage, however self-hosting has a couple of advantages over commercial options:
